p: The composition of the essential oils was analyzed by GC‐MS, the general chemical profiles of M. communis leaves and T. carmanicus aerial parts essential oils, the percentage content of the individual components, and retention indices, as summarized in Tables 2 and 3, respectively. The oil yields were 1.6 ± 0.1% and 0.56 ± 0.1% (v/w) on a dry weight basis for T. carmanicus and M. communis, respectively.
